rules: 1. The Penguin rotates each round so everyone gets a turn to judge.
2. The Penguin draws a ğŸ’¡ PROBLEM card and sets the stage.
3. Each player draws 4 ğŸ§© CONSTRAINTS and must use at least 1.
4. One random non-Penguin player gets a secret â­ï¸ TWIST.
5. Players pitch on a timer and may add a quick sketch.
6. The best pitch wins $100 and the round.
7. Each extra ğŸ§© CONSTRAINT used adds a $25 bonus when you win.
8. If the â­ï¸ TWIST player wins, they earn $200.
9. A correct challenge disqualifies them and costs $100; a wrong challenge disqualifies the accuser.
10. Top players enter the Final Round pitch-off, with one or more Penguins.
